Summary: white bright light was coming in thru the window giving a paralytic effect..once able to move saw a bright ball of light about the size of a car floating outside of window
divs: Sighting DetailsThis happened to my little sister who is 20 years old and has always thought my mom and I are weird for beleiving we wer getting visited every six months at this house. This is her account of what happened: "I opened my eyes and saw nothing but a bright, white light coming in thru the window, it encompassed my whole room. I was paralyzed,stuck to the bed!! All I could move was my eyes!! I looked at the clock and it was exactly 3am. I was very scared, I couldn't speak. Suddenly I felt a release & the light was gone from da room so I looked out the window and there was a huge ball of light floating outside my window!! just a sphere, no windows, no sound, about the size of a car but it was moving around,then it dissapeared!!"....this is when she called me and was very afraid and panicky!!! When I lived with my mom in that house more than ten years ago, I used to have the same thing happen exactly every six months!!! My mom and I wer the only ones to experience it and no1 beleived us..until one day my aunt came in as the light was coming in2 the room and interrupted, I was able to stand up and run outside..on top of our house was a HUGE black triangle with 3circular lights, 1 in each angle. the lights turned off & the craft drifted away without making any sound. It NEVER returned..This is the 1st time anything like that has happened in a decade!!! I don't have any memories of being "abducted", but the lights and the being stuck 2da bed sure are things I'll never forget
